ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Treatment_Assistance_Program", ISPICKVAL( Breast_Cancer_Subtype__c , 'Other (please specify)' ), ISBLANK(Other_Breast_Cancer_Subtype__c), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
